rows.label: tlk70000047_01_msg0001
rows.name:
If it's the palace you're after, my
lordships, just follow those steps up
and it's on the left. Can't miss it.

rows.label: tlk70000047_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, begging your pardon, most folks
are looking for the palace.
You're asking after the girl?

rows.label: tlk70000047_01_msg0003
rows.name:
That's my daughter, Freja. She's been
very frail since birth. An awful sickness,
your lordships, just terrible.

rows.label: tlk70000047_01_msg0004
rows.name:
The doctors say there's no medicine in
this land of Iira that would help her.
It's as good as incurable.

rows.label: tlk70000047_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Sometimes I wonder what's to become
of my little Freja...
